flags.name: Use light intensity
flags.description: Actor `intensity` param used.

flags.name: Invulnerable
flags.description: Actor cannot be harmed by other things/physics.

flags.name: Explodes when killed
flags.description:
Actor explodes when killed.
The `explode` Thing param must be set with explosion template.

flags.name: Breath under water
flags.description: Actor won't drawn under water.

flags.name: Invisible
flags.description: Actor is not visible to other actors.

flags.name: Deaf
flags.description: AI actor cannot hear other actors.

flags.name: Blind
flags.description: AI Actor cannot see other actors.

flags.name: Poisoned
flags.description:
Actor was bitten or sting by snake, spider, scorpion etc... and is poisoned.
HUD shows death icon for player.

flags.name: Delay fire
flags.description: AI actor will delay fire action.

flags.name: Immobile
flags.description: Actor cannot move.

flags.name: No target
flags.description: Player won't aim with weapon at actor.

flags.name: Player killed
flags.description: This flag is set by game engine.

flags.name: Electric whip
flags.description: Player has electric whip.

flags.name: Arachnid
flags.description:
Actor is spider, scorpion etc...
Flag causes the gen_a4sprite_blood_grn.mat and +vulcansplort to be created when actor is hit.

flags.name: Double sided
flags.description: Disables face backface culling for polygon face.

flags.name: Translucent
flags.description:
Face has texture with alpha channel and is put in alpha render queue.
This flag applies to adjoin surfaces and Thing 3D model surfaces.

flags.name: Clamp texture in X
flags.description: Mapped texture is clamped in X instead of being repeated (wrapped).

flags.name: Clamp texture in Y
flags.description: Mapped texture is clamped in Y instead of being repeated (wrapped).

flags.name: Point texture filtering
flags.description: Disables bilinear texture filtering for the polygon texture.

flags.name: ZWrite disabled
flags.description: Disables ZWrite for the polygon face.

flags.name: Ledge (3DO model)
flags.description:
Player can hang on the ledge of this polygon face. Applies only to 3DO model.
Same effect as surface flag Ledge = 0x1000000 for world surface

flags.name: Fog enabled
flags.description:
Enables fog rendering for the face polygon.
This flag is by default set for all faces but sky surfaces.

flags.name: WhipAim (3DO model)
flags.description:
Applies to polygon face of 3DO model and marks the whip aim surface.
Same effect as surface flag `WhipAim` = 0x10000000.

flags.name: Floor
flags.description: Surface is ground floor.

flags.name: COG linked
flags.description: Surface is linked in COG.

flags.name: Collision
flags.description: Surface has collision.

flags.name: AI cannot walk on surface
flags.description: AI won't walk on this surface.

flags.name: 2x scale
flags.description:
Affects SlideWall() COG function.
By default the animating surface matrix is resized to 320x320, this flag resizes it to 640x640.

flags.name: 1/2 scale
flags.description:
Affects SlideWall() COG function.
By default the animating surface matrix is resized to 320x320, this flag resizes it to 160x160.

flags.name: 1/8 scale
flags.description:
Affects SlideWall() COG function.
By default the animating surface matrix is resized to 320x320, this flag resizes it to 40x40.

flags.name: Aetherium
flags.description:
Aetherium surface.
If surface is hit or walk on by a thing it produces 'aetherium' environment fx sound, i.e.: fol_in_lrunaet.wav, fol_in_rrunaet.wav.

flags.name: Horizon sky
flags.description:
Surface is part of sky box.
e.g.: defined in 02_riv.

flags.name: Ceiling sky
flags.description:
Surface is part of ceiling sky.
e.g.: defined in 00_cyn.

flags.name: Scrolling
flags.description: Set by SlideWall() COG function.

flags.name: Kill floor
flags.description:
Player dies if it touches the surface.
e.g.: cyn_killfloor.cog

flags.name: Climbable
flags.description:
Player can climb on this surface.
e.g.:ladder

flags.name: Track
flags.description: Surface is part of a railroad track, e.g.: minecart track.

flags.name: Surface changed
flags.description: Used by the engine to mark the surface for rendering.

flags.name: Metal
flags.description: Metal surface.

flags.name: Water
flags.description: Water surface.

flags.name: Shallow water
flags.description: Shallow water surface.

flags.name: Earth
flags.description: Dirt surface.

flags.name: Web
flags.description: Surface is spider web.

flags.name: Lava
flags.description: Lava or frozen water surface.

flags.name: Snow
flags.description: Snow surface.

flags.name: Wood
flags.description: Wood surface.

flags.name: Ledge
flags.description: Surface is ledge from which player can hang on.

flags.name: Water climb out ledge
flags.description: Surface is ledge above the water from which the player can climb out of the water.

flags.name: 1/4 scale
flags.description:
Affects SlideWall() COG function.
By default the animating surface matrix is resized to 320x320, this flag resizes it to 80x80.

flags.name: 4x scale
flags.description:
Affects SlideWall() COG function.
By default the animating surface matrix is resized to 320x320, this flag resizes it to 1280x1280.

flags.name: Whip aim
flags.description: Player aims for whippable object on this surface.

flags.name: Echo
flags.description: Indoor surface. Walk on this surface produces *echo sound fx.

flags.name: Wood echo
flags.description: Indoor wood surface. Walk on this surface produces *echo sound fx.

flags.name: Earth echo
flags.description: Indoor dirt surface. Walk on this surface produces *echo sound fx.

flags.name: Emits light
flags.description: Thing object emits light. e.g. `light` param set.

flags.name: Destroyed
flags.description: Thing is destroyed and will be removed from the game.

flags.name: Whip climbable
flags.description:
On the WhipAim surface player can mount whip on thing and climb up the whip. e.g.: shs_whip.cog
Note: if set, thing can't have flag `Whip swingable` set

flags.name: Invisible
flags.description: Thing is invisible but touchable unlike `Hidden`.

flags.name: Can stand on
flags.description: nub_lightning.cog

flags.name: Mountable
flags.description: pyr_fixminecar.cog, shs_barrel.cog

flags.name: Dying
flags.description:
Used in combination with 'lifeleft' param.
Usually set by the engine marking the object has been killed and to be removed from the game.

flags.name: COG linked
flags.description: Thing is linked in COG.

flags.name: Wood
flags.description: Thing is wood object.

flags.name: Snow
flags.description: Thing is snow object.

flags.name: Sending pulse event
flags.description:
Thing sends pulse interval timeout event to its COG.
Usually set by COG script.

flags.name: Sending timer event
flags.description:
Thing sends timer timeout event to its COG.
Usually set by COG script

flags.name: Hidden
flags.description: Thing is hidden and disabled.

flags.name: Seen
flags.description:
Mark Thing to be already seen by player (camera).
 For example see: gen_bubblegen.cog, gen_watersplash.cog.

flags.name: Metal
flags.description: Thing is metal object.

flags.name: Earth
flags.description: Thing is earth (dirt) object.

flags.name: No Sound
flags.description: Thing makes not sound.

flags.name: Underwater
flags.description:
Thing is in or under water.
e.g.: swimming

flags.name: Climbable create
flags.description: Thing is create like object that player can climb on.

flags.name: Destroyed in water
flags.description: Thing is destroyed when enters water.

flags.name: Destroyed in air
flags.description: Thing is destroyed when enters water.

flags.name: Generates splash effect
flags.description: Sends splash message to it's COG.

flags.name: Movable
flags.description: Thing is movable/pushable.

flags.name: Whip swingable
flags.description:
On the `WhipAim` surface player can whip swing using this thing as whip mount point.
e.g.: In 00_cyn thing whip_branch.
